ej,battm101,P,honoj901,Balls and strikes Matt Batts ejected by HP umpire Jim Honochick
ej,richp101,M,grieb901,Balls and strikes White Sox Manager Paul Richards ejected by HP umpire Bill Grieve
$Marlin Stuart left with muscle pull
rain started
$Walt Masterson out on appeal; no DP
$the ball caromed off Billy Hitchcock's arm and hit him on the cheek, knocking him unconscious; he was helped from the field
$the Tigers came to bat at 7:08 PM and the lights had been on for 30 minutes; because of a league rule, the lights had be turned off since it was after 7 PM on a Sunday
$Walt Dropo ducked away from the pitch, the ball struck the bat and rolled to RF
ej,troud101,P,hurle901,Bench jockeying Dizzy Trout ejected by HP umpire Eddie Hurley
$Ike Delock waited to see if the line drive was caught
$George Kell's throw to 2B pulled Ted Lepcio off the bag
$Infield fly called and Ted Lepcio dropped the ball; no one heard the infield fly call; Lepcio threw to Vern Stephens who stepped on 2B for apparent force but did not tag the runner
ej,swifb102,P,duffj901,Balls and strikes Bob Swift ejected by HP umpire Jim Duffy
$Jerry Priddy broke his leg sliding into HP
$Phil Rizzuto caught the ball barely in OF grass and tossed the ball to Martin at 2B while Johnny Hopp tagged
Debut game for Harry Schaeffer
$on the attempted squeeze, Joe Astroth called for obstruction during rundown
$Dick Gernert stole 3B when he caught Bill Wight napping as he stood off the rubber; Fred Hatfield let Wight's hurried throw roll away
$Walt Dropo fell rounding 3B and tried to crawl back to the bag, only to find Don Lenhardt already there; Dropo raced home and was thrown out in a collision with Del Wilbur
$Del Wilbur left with a thigh bruise suffered in his collision with Walt Dropo in previous inning
